emails.subject: Welcome to Gloogle
emails.preview: Welcome to your new Gloogle account! We're excited to have you join us. Here are some tips to get started...

emails.subject: Your Calendar Reminder
emails.preview: You have an upcoming meeting 'Team Sync' tomorrow at 10:00 AM

emails.subject: Security Alert
emails.preview: New sign-in detected from Windows device in San Francisco, CA

emails.subject: Your Drive Storage is Almost Full
emails.preview: You've used 90% of your storage. Consider upgrading your storage plan or freeing up space.

emails.subject: Invitation to Collaborate
emails.preview: I've shared a document 'Q2 Planning' with you. Click here to view and edit.

emails.subject: Your Weekly Summary
emails.preview: Here's your weekly activity summary: 15 emails sent, 45 received, 3 meetings attended.

emails.subject: Password Reset Request
emails.preview: We received a request to reset your password. If this wasn't you, please secure your account.

emails.subject: Weekend Project Update
emails.preview: Hi! I've completed the initial designs. Please review and let me know your thoughts.

emails.subject: Your Subscription Renewal
emails.preview: Your Gloogle Workspace subscription will renew automatically in 7 days.

emails.subject: Team Building Event
emails.preview: Join us for our monthly virtual team building event next Friday at 4 PM.
